News.Title: Accuracy Shipping Credit Rating Downgraded to BB+
News.Summary: CRISIL downgrades Accuracy Shipping's long-term bank facilities rating from BBB-/Stable to BB+/Stable on ₹128 crore facilities, citing weakening business performance and declining operating income.

News.Title: Accuracy Shipping Reports Mixed Performance with Revenue Decline and Profit Drop
News.Summary: Accuracy Shipping Limited's Board approved quarterly results showing revenue from operations at Rs 2,890.6 million and net profit of Rs 8.02 million for the quarter ended September 30, 2025. The company operates in three business segments including logistics services, petroleum products sales, and motor vehicle sales, with consolidated results including subsidiary Jayant Logistics Private Limited.
